programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S01EP05) Christa is a musician, author and broadcaster who has added mom to her list of jobs. She wants a new wardrobe that isn't curated to handle spills and stains, but rather a colourful, elevated version that shows the world this mom has it going on !
Année : 2022

programme.title: By Hook or By Cook
programme.desc:
(S01EP06) Louise, a once independent woman who loved the freedom of going where she wanted, whenever she wanted, is now feeling lost with her new life in a wheelchair.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Forest Bathing: Rooted in Science
programme.desc:
Join Alex Smyth on a voyage of health and wellness as he explores the world of Shinrin-Yoku, or Forest Bathing. Alex learns more about its history and science, and discovers how Forest Bathing is being adopted in Canada.
Année : 2022

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP01) Sexuality Educator Rachele Manett explores the unique and varied ways people with a disability find partners and navigate the world of dating and sex.
Année : 2006

programme.title: AMI This Week - From The Vault
programme.desc:
(S09EP33) Alex Smyth shares his family's German potato salad recipe, that blends the traditional with the modern style. Then, Grant Hardy chats with singer Mandy Harvey, who is Deaf, and learns about her journey and how music helped save her.
Année : 2006

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc:
(S10EP00) On this special episode of AMI This Week, we're celebrating our 10-year anniversary with members of the ATW team, both past and present.
Année : 2006

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP32) Pour le 40ème anniversaire de la Fondation MIRA on parle de sa mission permettant d'améliorer la vie des personnes aveugles. On s'entretient avec notre chroniqueur littéraire M. Cousineau.
Année : 2006

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Karen Weaver, Mayor of Flint, Michigan Mitch Twolan, Mayor of Huron-Kinloss, Ontario, explore how to ensure the nearly 40 million Canadians and Americans around the Great Lakes have clean water by examining the Flint Water Crisis.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Teenager Mac Denniston nearly lost his life in a mountain bike accident. The crash left him with a Traumatic Brain Injury, but 18 months on he's making remarkable progress.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Dr Huhana Hickey is a key figure in the disability community. She's organising a hikoi to seek a better future for the next generation - and marking her life story with a moko kauae.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Postcards From ...
programme.desc:
Join host Alex Smyth for an adventure that includes Wolfdogs, underground caves, adapted skiing, and ice climbing as we visit the Alberta Rockies.
Année : 2011

programme.title: The Musical History of Lucas Haneman
programme.desc:
We tell the story of Lucas Haneman, a musician who is blind, and hear the magic he makes with his guitar.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Do The Grind Blind
programme.desc:
AMI's Grant Hardy joins a group of blind and partially sighted youth and young adults on their journey to conquer Vancouver's infamous mountain hike, the Grouse Grind.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Always an active person, Tiffiney Perry continued participating in sports and achieving success after a spinal cord injury in her 20s. Now she and husband Chris support others to enjoy the benefits of sport.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Carlos Biggeman is an award-winning photographer, he's about to publish a book of his work. He was born with Down syndrome, but doesn't see it as a barrier.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Du silence et des ombres
programme.desc:
(3) U.S. 1962. Racial prejudice in a small southern town as seen through the eyes of two youngsters whose father defends a Negro accused of raping a white girl.
Année : 2011
Réalisation : R. Mulligan
Avec : Gregory Peck Mary Badham Philip Alford

programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.title: Mr.D
programme.desc:
